content: Va, pensiero, sull'ali dorate; // va, ti posa sui clivi, sui colli, // ove olezzano tepide e molli // l'aure dolci del suolo natal!
translations: eng:Fly, thought, on wings of gold;  go settle upon the slopes and the hills,  where, soft and mild, the sweet airs  of our
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by MrShoval (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
